title: What is the contribution of Count Camillo de Cavour in the unification of Italy? - Quora

response.answer_text: Cavour successfully negotiated Piedmont's way through the Crimean War, the Second Italian War of Independence, and Garibaldi's expeditions, managing to maneuver Piedmont diplomatically to become a new great power in Europe, controlling a nearly united Italy that was five times as large as Piedmont had been before he came to power. Source: Camillo Benso, Count of Cavour - Wikipedia Please upvote!!

Cavour’s political strategies for unification of Italy were complementary to Garibaldi’s military campaigns for the same purpose, without both of which the unification of Italy would not have come about.
